runs.comm: flights just outside off and he comes forward to block

shortish with a hint of room outside off and he punches off the back foot. Goes straight to cover, but he fumbles it. Taylor's not going to be pleased. He's made himself clear about wanting to field a lot better than they've been doing
round the wicket to the left-hander and this length ball is tucked to short fine leg
flight on offer and Anwar appreciates it as he lunges forward and slams it to the long-off boundary.
held it back just a touch, but there was still enough air to that to draw the batsman forward and guide it towards point
tossed up, but it's directed on the pads. Wants to flick to short fine again, but doesn't succeed
this short of a length delivery straightens outside off. Open face of the bat finds point

delicious wicket that! Moves away, bounces more and snares the outside edge! He looked rather ominous on the front foot, but the Anwar experiment hasn't worked too well. This is back of a length and angled into him which makes him push from the crease. The shape away and the extra bounce are too much for him to handle and Taylor pockets an easy take
short of a good length, but it's the left-hander so this time he's a little too straight. Nudged behind square off his pads

fullish on off stump, comes forward to defend on the off side but there's hesitation! And yep, it costs Asif. They set off, but both of them stalled after a couple of steps and stared at each other. That was enough for Sikandar Raza to run in from mid-off and underarm a direct hit at the bowlers'
full, but down the leg side. Requires Taylor to dive full-length to his right to save the deflection off the pads
almost a yorker on off stump, dug out
short enough to go back and punch through the covers.
picked away off his pads to deep square leg. Length ball provides release
tossed up on off stump, defends down the pitch
pushed back to the bowler as he stays back to negotiate this good length ball outside off
darted in on middle and leg and he sweeps it down to deep square leg
full and flat, but Khurram preferred to wait on the back foot. Ended up doing too much of that as he is hurried into playing a shot. Gets an inside edge to the right of the keeper
terrible line to start with. Length ball angled down the leg side and he whips it away. Too far to the left of deep square leg. Neatly done
just short of a good length as he covers the line and dabs towards midwicket. Played soft enough to take a quick single. Repetitive and loud calls of "yeah" for that
touch of inswing there as he goes full on off stump. Khurram has to adjust and blocks
dabs at a good length ball which probes the angle across the left-hander. Slip was in business there but he misses
shortish and cramping him for room. Khurram seemed a little late with his flick and the ball lobs of him towards short cover
guided to point as this was full with a lot of room
fullish and just outside off and he generates that little bit of away curl. Watchfully defended
back of a length and just outside off, dabbed straight to point
lazy shot outside the off stump. This was back of a length and perhaps straightened as well. Patil hangs his bat out and is duly beaten
fullish and this one is angled in on off stump. Nudged just wide of mid-on
just short of a good length as he targets fifth stump, eased away to point with an open blade
bit more shorter that time, but still no room. Khurram presents a delicate dab, too much so because it goes one bounce to the keeper
strays a little too full that time and Patil has launched that over mid-on. Not quite a half-volley as he goes scrambled seam, but it's the field was up and he took advantage
low full toss angled on middle and leg, Patil whips it deep square leg
goes around and this is shortish and just outside off. Khurram is on his back foot and steers to deep third man

slower short ball, but it comes down with a bit too much width. Patil waits and cuts to the boundary. But that wasn't too far away from point. Dived full length to his left, but couldn't get a hand to it. Great effort
answers with one targeting the batsman's feet. Good, full length keeps Patil honest
this time it's a half-volley on off stump and Patil drills through extra cover. Terrific strike and he helped himself by moving leg side to enable a full swing of the arms
tossed up on the stumps, Khurram gets down on one-knee and sweeps dead square. Lovely placement
flighted on middle, he comes forward and finds midwicket
blazes down the track but the bowler's spotted him and pulled his length back and tucked him up for room as well. Khurram swings away and a thick inside edge squirts to deep square leg.
loopy legspinner, driven into the covers
just a touch short and he rocks back and cuts to the sweeper

that's a ripper! He's found the perfect length with this, there was good flight, the ball was drifting in as well which meant the batsman had to play. But once it pitched, there was appreciable turn and it beat the outside edge by a big margin
and more turn. Tossed up on off stump and he tickles it towards short fine leg.
lovely flight on this one as he targets middle stump. Defended
races down the track but he hasn't struck it as well as he would want to. Falls one-bounce to long-on.

shortened his length considerable there and Khurram pulls strongly to deep square leg. They jog along thinking it was a boundary, but have to motor for the second. Relay throw from the deep and had there been a direct hit, it might well have been out. Instead Raza gives away four overthrows
flighted on middle and leg, defended
tossed up and angled across him, Khurram prefers to stay back and dab to point
whipped against the turn to long-on as this was looped up outside off
takes it on the full and slaps it through extra cover. He ensures he has enough room to thump it through the vacant area
flighted outside leg as he goes the the sweep. Doesn't connect and the ump gets some exercise
dances down to the pitch of a tossed up one on leg stump and drills to midwicket
another one that slips too far down leg. Khurram sweeps but can't put bat to it
this is majestic! Same technique as the last four. Excellent footwork to reach the pitch and he kept himself leg side of the ball to cream it over the top of cover
immediately the bowler goes quick and flat, Khurram punches it to long-on for the fifty partnership
goes wide of the crease but it doesn't help. He only ends up offering a whole lot of room and Patil slaps it to the right of point. Too well hit for the sweeper as well
good length ball and it seemed to be getting big on him as he went down to sweep from outside off, but Khurram manages to keep it down and find deep square leg
flighted outside off and he comes forward and milks a single to long-off
well done by Williams. Spotted him advancing and pulled his length back. Khurram works towards midwicket and steals a single
Patil comes at the bowler, but Williams is wise to him as well. Ensures he can't get under it and offers no room either. Leading edge goes into the off side

goes for the sweep and he's picked out the man in the deep! Hasn't quite got on top of the bounce as Williams flighted this outside off. Went through with the shot again but this time he gets more of a top edge and is snapped up by Chigumbura. Had to fetch that and that spells his end
chips down and nudges towards long-on, but Williams runs to his right and dives to save the single
fullish and just outside off, pushed into the covers
push and run into the covers. The fielder pushes an underarm throw which doesn't have enough pace to find the batsman short
tossed up and angled on the pads, Patil looks for a fine sweep, doesn't connect

he's gone! Patil was again looking to play too square on the leg side but this was a length ball outside off. Would've been far better off punching through to long-off as he misses the risky flick and seems to be in line with off stump.
flighted on off stump, he comes forward to block
shortish and a bit outside off, cut away to the sweeper
looped up outside off, Mustafa strides forward and pushes into the covers

another leg before and UAE are crumbling! Amjad stayed back and played all around it. This is plumb as well. Darted in on off stump and it turns a touch. He was looking for an easy single through the vacant midwicket, but he misses. This one was a lot quicker
good length ball just outside off, slapped to long-off
flighted much slower as he draws the batsman forward to block
opens the face to slice this behind point for a quick single
flighted on off stump and he gets a bit of turn. Javed  is back behind it and blocks
nice and tight on off stump as this good length ball is pushed back to the bowler
hint of room and Mustafa goes deep in his crease and cuts hard to the sweeper
fired in quick and down the leg side, Javed tickles it towards the fine leg boundary for a couple
stays rooted to the crease as he seeks to swing his arms freely. This good length ball pitches and turns into him forcing Javed's punch to go straight down the ground
tossed up and pushed to long-off
lunges forward towards the pitch and he nudges it with the turn towards square leg

big shout for leg before, but Zimbabwe have their man off a run-out, a second one. Good length ball turns off the pitch as Mustafa lunges forward and outside off. He was hit in line, but it would have missed leg. The appeal had made Mustafa forget this had gone straight to short fine leg
flighted on middle and off, bit of turn and bounce gets the splice as he lunges forward to block
comes forward and defends the length ball tentatively
there he goes! His defence was not inspiring any sense of confidence and so he goes after a tossed up delivery on off stump. The swing was just as tentative and he presents a simple skier to mid-off

misfield at long-off. It's Mushangwe, the catcher from the previous ball. This was tossed up just outside off. Javed goes for it but the loft falls short of the rushing fielder and doesn't bounce as high as he expected
flighted on middle and off, he keeps it out
good length ball on the stumps, goes back and pushes to long-on
short and pushed down the leg side, Silva pulls to deep square leg
length ball on middle, defended off the back foot
shortish and outside off, cut away quite nicely behind point
pushed through on middle and leg, he was making a bit of room for himself, but can't get it away
chipped to long-off. Silva's looking quite competent here. Came forward to the pitch of it and lofts it over the gap
positions himself way outside leg, easy enough to spot for Raza as he follows him with a quicker one. Pushed down to long-off
gorgeous stroke. Opens the face on impact and had no intention of keeping this down. Tossed up with a bit of turn, but that just helps him hit inside out over the covers
pushed through down the leg side, tries to sweep and misses
defended back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, confident push to long-off

he has another! The extra ball works for Zimbabwe as Javed's moving around in the crease contributes to his dismissal. Follows him with a quicker and fuller ball which he flicks straight down the throat of deep square leg
good length ball just outside off, punches into the off side but finds Raza
flighted outside off, Silva leans into a cover drive that doesn't best the man in the deep
slower with a bit more loop, so he gets a bit of spin as well. Defended
too munch angle on that as this fuller ball slides down leg
flighted on middle, turned towards midwicket for a quick single. The fielder fails to pick up the ball. Raza again
touch short outside off and he dabs to point
loads of flight on that, invites Shahzad forward for a drive to long-off
pace works for UAE. This was full and pushed into the batsman who was making room outside leg. Shahzad manages to flick it over midwicket and to the boundary
shortish and angled in at middle and off stump, he backs away to try and upper cut but doesn't connect. Third man is inside the circle
another cut seeking the third man boundary, but he can't connect this time either
slower ball on off stump deceives the batsman. Goes for a flick which lobs up. But there is no one close enough to catch it. Single to long-on
another offcutter has the left-hander fishing outside off. No dice
another slower ball, but this time the batsman is better prepared. Waits on it and half-flicks and half-pulls to deep square leg
low full toss outside off, tries to pick the gap between short third man and point. Hasn't timed it well enough. Chigumbura dives to his left to keep that to a single. Clutches his thumb after.
full and straight as Shahzad makes room and slices to extra cover. Goes one-bounce to the fielder
clears his front leg and carves the fuller ball on off stump to extra cover again
almost a yorker on off stump, dragged to deep midwicket
low full toss on off stump, Silva flays this through to deep point
makes room and swipes this full delivery on middle to long-on
Shahzad disagrees, of course. It was a slower ball on length and that sat up for him. Cleared his front leg and swung away over deep midwicket
follows up with another offcutter, but this was a little fuller. Shahzad swings again but doesn't connect. Misses off stump by just a bit too
these slower balls aren't really working. Shahzad set himself up and waited just a little longer than the last one and creams this over long-on. Another length ball dispatched
leg stump cartwheels! Shazad was looking for the leg side boundary, but this time Chatara went with his stock ball, angling into him. Wasn't as full as the situation merited but he has his revenge
fullish and outside off, slogged to long-on

looks to be a bit too cheeky as he runs away to the off side and looks for the ramp over fine leg. Too difficult a ball to get under as Chatara goes for the blockhole. Dot to finish and that tells the story of the innings, really. Too many needless shots
